text:
/circle6 When to return for follow-up
/circle6 Complete immunisation of baby
Danger signs—return immediately:
/circle6  If baby is breastfeeding poorly
/circle6  If baby develops fever or feels cold to 
the touch
/circle6 Breathes fast 
/circle6 Has diffi  culty in breathing 
/circle6 Has blood in the stool
/circle6 If the palms and soles are yellow
/circle6 Has convulsions
Danger signs—return immediately
/circle6 Increase in vaginal bleeding
/circle6 Convulsions
/circle6 Fast or diffi  cult br
